text: Eghtɨ gumazitam datɨrɨghɨn ko gɨn otivamin bizibar akar akɨnafarir kamɨn itibar tam adeghtɨ, eghtɨ God an bizir aghuiba a dam ada adegham. Eghtɨ a temer ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdimɨn daghetam raman kogham, egh God baghavɨra itir nguibamɨn ikian kogham. Nguibar kam, akɨnafarir kam an gun mɨgei.”
